## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (x=17.5, y=20.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine at position (x=17.5, y=20.5) with energy 15000.0, working status, connected to a pipe-to-ground at position (x=16.5, y=17.5) and a pipe at position (x=17.5, y=17.5).
- Boiler at position (x=1.5, y=23.0) with fuel inventory containing coal, energy 2000.0, working status, connected to multiple pipes including positions (x=-0.5, y=21.5), (x=1.5, y=21.5), (x=0.5, y=21.5), (x=2.5, y=21.5), (x=3.5, y=21.5), and (x=-0.5, y=23.5).
- Offshore Pump at position (x=-9.5, y=24.5) with working status, connected to pipes at positions (x=-9.5, y=23.5) and (x=-8.5, y=23.5).
- PipeGroup for steam with fluid system 683, working status, spanning positions from (x=3.5, y=17.5) to (x=10.5, y=21.5).
- PipeGroup for water with fluid system 694, working status, spanning positions from (x=-9.5, y=23.5) to (x=-0.5, y=23.5).
- ElectricityGroup with id 1277, consisting of poles at various positions including (x=24.5, y=22.5), (x=16.5, y=24.5), (x=33.5, y=24.5), (x=3.5, y=20.5), (x=12.5, y=23.5), and (x=20.5, y=19.5).

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors with Stale Entity Data
- Ensure that the entity data is refreshed and up-to-date before performing operations that depend on the current state of entities on the map. This will prevent issues arising from using outdated or incorrect data.

## NAMESPACE

- No utility functions or important variables have been defined or assigned in the provided execution steps.
